== Istruzioni per il download via SVN del progetto ==

Prerequisiti:
  * Java JDK (SE) -> *[http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp Download]* 
  * Eclipse for Java EE -> *[http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/galileosr2 Download]*
  * Plugin Eclipse per Subversioning (es: *[http://subclipse.tigris.org/servlets/ProjectProcess?pageID=p4wYuA Subclipse]*, *[http://www.eclipse.org/subversive/downloads.php Subversive]*)
  * Oracle/PostgreSQL + Tomcat v6.0 -> *[http://code.google.com/p/lmadb/wiki/ConfigurazioneTomcatOraclePostgres Guida]*


==== SVN checkout ====

Eclipse -> File -> New -> Project -> SVN -> Project from SVN<br>
Create a new repository location
  URL: http://lmadb.googlecode.com/svn
_Next_

Select resource 
  URL: http://lmadb.googlecode.com/svn/trunk
  Revision: Head revision
_Finish_

Checkout as a project with tha name specified
  name: lmadb
_Finish_
